summary: I'm new to modding & this is my 2nd mod
descriptionHtml:
Hi again, I'm not a modder, I just like to mess around with CK. Today I just want to try something new about AI packages & dabbling with Alduin & some other sovngarde npcs for a bit. I also found out there has been awfully few non-human follower mods around so this came out from that. I upload it because well, I'm a generous man. Better yet, I want to hear feedbacks & suggestions so I may improve myself.

Mod description

He's big, he's mean, he's red, he's half dragon & he doesn't give a skeever butt what the Windhelm nords has to say about an argonian walking their streets instead of hiding in an assemblage like his kind should!
I made a barbarian argonian who can breathe fire like a dragon. Though I want him to use Odahviing fire breath voice but I failed.

- He wanders around Windhelm, I focused him to stay at the market area but I can't promise he will only stays there though. When dismiss, he'll go back to Windhelm & wandering around just to piss off those racist nords
- He knows Unrelenting force & breathes fire like a dragon
- He's tall, about 1.20 ingame measurement
- I give him some health & stamina so he could be tougher like how a half dragon should be, but not that godly tough though
- He's essential (for some reason I can't flagged him as protected, it's whether essential or ghost)
- He scales with the player
- He can be married, if you're into tail & scales of course ;)
- He's cheat perkwise. Well of course he is because he can breathe fire.
- He has no mana so you should not try to teach him any spells

Installation
-Extract the file to SteamAppscommonskyrimData

Known Issue(s)
-According to my test runs, his head is green, but then I restart the game & it's all good.
-In rare case, his shop might make your selling items disappear, no idea how to fix that.
-You might find his fire breath coming from behind his head or his ear, that's usually because he used it before or while he's moving from that spot
-You might see him shrink when he uses something like enchantment table, that's because the game designs stuff for npcs with the heigh of 1.00 ingame measurement

What I've learned
- Whether because the file is corrupted or it's the CK itself, it's impossible to customize argonian looks
- I can just put the armors in their inventory & they'll wear it the first time you tell them to follow you
- Dragonfirebreath is not firebreathshout & it has no cooldown

Future plans
- same as the previous mod

Legal stuff
Do whatever you want with this, at least telling me first would be nice

Update history
1.00 Initial release
2.00 Scaled the multiplier down to 1
2.1 Edit some AI packages, seems giving patrol AI & wander AI together makes him stand still. So I removed the patrol AI, he should be wandering Windhelm market for now.

My first experiment result
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19424/
author: laomaster
